Reviews.Title: Shame on this seller
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Flye
Reviews.Content: Shame on this seller for selling a shoddy product. It came fast, yes, but it didn't work. She protected herself by selling it "as is" and now she's $25 richer off of someone who was expecting a product that worked. The phone came and all it was was a white screen... didn't even turn on. Completely inoperable. Not only this, but she packaged it poorly in just an envelope with no padding or protection. When we tried to return it, she refused to accept the return, again noting that the product was "as is"... but why is sheSamsung SGH-T429 Slider Cell phone selling a phone that doesn't work? Are you kidding me? That is out right wrong.This seller is a scam and I feel dirty having done business with her. DO NOT BUY HER PRODUCTS, you won't know if what you get works and she's protected by saying "AS IS"Shame on her for taking advantage of people.

Reviews.Title: Classic slider
Reviews.Author: nethead
Reviews.Content: I love this little slider for the ease of use and the small form factor.  Not a smart tablet but great if you want the basics.  Easy to carry and simple to use.  Great battery life.

Reviews.Title: terrible product
Reviews.Author: eli berman
Reviews.Content: within two days of getting a cell phone from these guys it broke by me just having it in my pocket and i didnt do anything to it just another rip off

Reviews.Title: Basic Just The Way I Like It...
Reviews.Author: C. E. Elmore "70's Mama"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Slider Phone to replace a previous one and was not disappointed. It does what it says and holds up well for my needs.  The price was just right.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SGH-T429 Slider Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: geri
Reviews.Content: It is the best model cell phone that is made;  ease of use, plenty of built in features, speakerphone, nice sounding ringtones,and this is my second one.  Also has a camera. The slide is a fun feature.  Again, ease of use.  Bought on Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Good Phone!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Phoenix
Reviews.Content: I needed a phone cause i lost my HTC in the river:( so i am saving for a new one but not an HTC i wouldn't recommend that phone ( just saying ) but i got this phone and it was a great shape like new and the sound and everything is fine, not a phone i would like to have all the time but its a good back up plan if u need one for the mean time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE...RECOMMEND
Reviews.Author: Mary J. Sanquintin "BASS FREAK"
Reviews.Content: MY SON LOVES THE PHONE...IS GREAT AND THE PRICE WAS EVEN BETTER..FAST SHIPPING...I RECOMMEND TO BUY!!

Reviews.Title: Major misrepresentation!
Reviews.Author: adeolu adeoye
Reviews.Content: This phone was sold as unlocked. Not only is is locked, it also cannot be unlocked. So it has been a waste of money and time so far. This is my worst Amazon purchase. GRRRRRRRR!!!!!
